backend/main.mo: Motoko actor that mixes in blob storage and manages premium activations, storing activation timestamps per user and exposing functions to activate premium and query its status with a 1-year expiry.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented feature IDs and titles to their relevant source files, component dependencies, and test IDs for build verification.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON dictionary of short summaries for each frontend source file, describing the purpose and key behaviors of every component, page, hook, and context in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS entry file defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens used throughout the app.
frontend/index.html: HTML shell for the React app, loading the app logo, Hind Siliguri font, AdSense SDK, and mounting the root div with the main.tsx module entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root app component orchestrating the splash → registration → interstitial → main layout flow, handling page navigation via state and custom window events, and attaching a global click-sound listener.
frontend/src/components/AdBanner.tsx: Simple ad banner component that renders a dismissible advertisement strip for non-premium users, hiding itself when the user is premium or has clicked the close button.
frontend/src/components/AdMobBanner.tsx: Google AdSense/AdMob banner component that initializes the adsbygoogle push once and renders an ins ad unit, hidden entirely for premium users.
frontend/src/components/BottomSheet.tsx: Reusable bottom sheet modal with a slide-up animation, backdrop, optional title header, and sound effects on open and close.
frontend/src/components/CameraModal.tsx: A modal component that activates the device camera using the `useCamera` hook, displays a live video preview, and captures a photo as a File on user request.
frontend/src/components/CongratulationsA: Displays a full-screen confetti canvas animation with a Bengali congratulations message when a user activates premium, auto-dismissing after 3.5 seconds.
frontend/src/components/DeveloperInfoMod: A modal dialog that shows developer (MD JAHID HASAN RUBEL) and app (Smart Shop Ledger v1.0.0) information with dark/light theme support.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: A React class-based error boundary that catches render errors, logs them, and displays a bilingual (English/Bengali) fallback UI with a reload button.
frontend/src/components/InterstitialAdSc: A full-screen interstitial ad screen with a 5-second countdown before allowing dismissal; premium users see a brief loading screen and are auto-redirected.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: The main app shell providing a sticky header, scrollable main content area, a bottom navigation bar with five tabs, and a conditional ad banner for non-premium users.
frontend/src/components/NotificationToas: A fixed-position toast notification component that animates in/out from the top of the screen and auto-dismisses after 3 seconds, styled with a green shop-ledger branding theme.
frontend/src/components/PremiumModal.tsx: A bottom-sheet modal for activating premium features via promo or purchase codes, with a 1-minute trial option, email contact support, and a congratulations animation on success.
frontend/src/components/RegistrationModa: A full-screen registration modal that collects shop profile info (name, owner, phone, address, category), validates inputs, saves to localStorage, and supports skipping—both paths mark registration as complete.
frontend/src/components/ShoppingListPopu: A bottom-sheet shopping list manager that supports adding items with name/quantity/price, swipe-to-mark-bought gestures, delete, and persists data to localStorage.
frontend/src/components/SplashScreen.tsx: An animated splash screen with a progress bar that runs for ~2.5 seconds before fading out and calling an onComplete callback, featuring a green shop-ledger logo and pulsing background effects.
frontend/src/components/TaskListPopup.ts: A bottom-sheet popup for managing a task list with add, delete, and hold-to-complete functionality, persisting tasks to localStorage and playing a bell sound on completion.
frontend/src/components/TodaysSalesPopup: A bottom-sheet popup that reads today's sales from localStorage and displays a summary of total income, net profit, and an itemized sales list.
frontend/src/contexts/LanguageContext.ts: Provides a React context for English/Bengali language switching, with a translation helper `t()` that resolves dot-notated keys against a translations object, persisting the selection to localStorage.
frontend/src/contexts/NotificationContex: Provides a React context that exposes a `showNotification` function, rendering a `NotificationToast` component driven by the `useNotification` hook.
frontend/src/contexts/ThemeContext.tsx: Provides a React context for light/dark mode and accent color theming, applying CSS custom properties to the document root when the theme changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A React hook that creates and caches an Internet Computer actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, invalidating dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useClickSound.ts: Provides click sound playback via the Web Audio API, supporting a built-in tone or a custom base64-encoded sound from localStorage, with a `useClickSound` hook for toggling, uploading, and removing sounds.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication using DFINITY's AuthClient, exposing login/logout functions, identity state, and login status.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotification.ts: Custom hook that manages in-app notification visibility and message state, respecting a localStorage toggle and playing a sound on show.
Custom hook that plays a notification sound using either a user-uploaded audio file or a default Web Audio API chime, gated by a localStorage sound-enabled flag.
frontend/src/hooks/usePremiumStatus.ts: Custom hook that reads premium activation state from localStorage, enforces a one-year expiry, and returns activation/expiry dates along with an active status flag.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that sets up Tailwind directives, CSS custom properties for the dark theme, typography, scrollbar styling, and keyframe animations used throughout the app.
frontend/src/locales/translations.ts: Exports a translations object containing English and Bengali string keys for all UI text used across the application.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AddSale.tsx: Page component for recording a new sale, with a form for product name, quantity, unit, prices, color tag, note, and photo capture, saving entries to localStorage with a free-tier limit of 199 sales.
frontend/src/pages/History.tsx: Page component that displays, searches, and filters sales history from localStorage, shows today's income and profit summaries, and allows individual sale deletion.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Home dashboard page that displays today's sales stats (profit, income, items sold) loaded from localStorage, with quick-access buttons for shopping list, task list, and today's sales popups.
frontend/src/pages/Lists.tsx: A to-do/shopping list page where users can add, toggle, and delete list items with optional price and notes; adding items is premium-gated beyond free usage.
frontend/src/pages/ProductList.tsx: Product inventory management page allowing users to add, edit, and delete products with retail/wholesale prices and stock info; free users are limited to 10 products.
frontend/src/pages/Profile.tsx: Shop profile page where users can view and edit their shop name, owner name, phone, address, category, and profile photo, with data persisted to localStorage.
frontend/src/pages/Settings.tsx: Settings page providing controls for language, dark/light theme, accent color, sound, notifications, and premium subscription management with a developer info modal.
frontend/src/utils/sounds.ts: Web Audio API utility module that provides functions for generating various UI sounds (click, bell, cash register, bubble pop, whoosh) using oscillators and noise buffers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration enabling dark mode, custom CSS-variable-based color palette, extended border radius, custom keyframe animations (accordion, shake, slide-up, bubble-float), and plugins for animate, typography, and container queries.
project_state.json: Project state document (version 3) tracking the Smart Shop Ledger app's implemented features, architectural notes, known issues, and image requirements, including premium codes, toast notifications, ad banners, language-aware UI, and splash screen redesign.
